channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Embrace The Red

item.title: Yolo: Natural Language to Shell Commands with ChatGPT API
item.description: Once in a while I go build some fun new tools to adopt new tech. Just last week OpenAI made their gpt-3.5-turbo model accessible via API endpoints. Update: The latest version also supports GPT-4. So, I thought it’s time to start building a tool to leverage it. What is yolo? Do you know those moments when you can’t remember a shell command, or some arguments to it? How do you pipe all errors to /dev/null again?
